body_html:
Could you run with --verbose_failures. That flag (mentioned in the error message above) should help narrow down precisely which of the sub-commands initiated by bazel is failing. Something like:

bazel build --config=opt --config=mkl --copt="-DEIGEN_USE_VML" --verbose_failures \
   //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
body:
Could you run with `--verbose_failures`. That flag (mentioned in the error message above) should help narrow down precisely which of the sub-commands initiated by bazel is failing. Something like:

```
bazel build --config=opt --config=mkl --copt="-DEIGEN_USE_VML" --verbose_failures \
   //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
```
